value.title: Unmasking Artificial Intelligence: The Battle for Ethical Innovation and Accountability
value.excerpt: Bias and Fairness: AI algorithms can inadvertently perpetuate bias, discrimination, and unfairness. They learn from historical data, which may contain biases, and replicate those biases in their decision-making processes. This bias can manifest in areas like hiring practices, lending decisions, and criminal justice.
